details.description:
The British Embassy offices in Rome are not open to the public. Visits are by appointment only. 
We do not answer visa enquiries.
details.access_and_opening_times:
2016 public holidays

  • Friday 1 January: new year’s day
  • Wednesday 6 January: Epiphany
  • Friday 25 March: good Friday
  • Monday 28 March: Easter Monday
  • Monday 25 April: liberation day
  • Monday 2 May: May bank holiday
  • Thursday 2 June: Italian Republic day
  • Wednesday 29 June: Rome patron day (Rome only)
  • Monday 15 August: Ferragosto
  • Monday 29 August: summer bank holiday
  • Tuesday 1 November: all saints day
  • Wednesday 7 December: Milan patron day (Milan only)
  • Thursday 8 December: Immaculate conception
  • Monday 26 December: boxing day
  • Tuesday 27 December

General physical access

  • Disabled access is possible through the main gate
  • Access to the 1st and 2nd floor is possible with the lifts that have doors wide enough for wheelchairs
  • There is a disabled toilet at the 2nd floor in front of the Consular/Visa office

For security reasons there is no parking available for visitors. Limited parking is available in the area, but it is extremely busy and visitors should not rely on getting a space. Parking may be requested within the grounds of the embassy in case of special need.

Contact us

If you feel that our services may be inaccessible to you, please contact our receptionists on +39 06 4220 0001 who will try and find an alternative way of providing access for you.

other.title: UK Representation to the UN Agencies for Food and Agriculture

services.title: Transferring funds for prisoners / for financial assistance service

details.access_and_opening_times:
Opening hours

  • The Milan Consular section is open Monday to Friday 9.30am to 12.30pm and from 2pm to 4pm.

2016 public holidays

  • Friday 1 January: new year’s day
  • Wednesday 6 January: Epiphany
  • Friday 25 March: good Friday
  • Monday 28 March: Easter Monday
  • Monday 25 April: liberation day
  • Monday 2 May: May bank holiday
  • Thursday 2 June: Italian Republic day
  • Wednesday 29 June: Rome patron day (Rome only)
  • Monday 15 August: Ferragosto
  • Monday 29 August: summer bank holiday
  • Tuesday 1 November: all saints day
  • Wednesday 7 December: Milan patron day (Milan only)
  • Thursday 8 December: Immaculate conception
  • Monday 26 December: boxing day
  • Tuesday 27 December

General physical access

  • The Consulate is on the 5th floor and has disabled access by lift.
  • Please be aware that we do not have toilet facilities.

Please be aware that we have no ‘Left Luggage’ facilities at the Consulate and for security reasons we are unable to keep unattended suitcases. Any luggage left unattended at the Consulate will be removed and may be destroyed. Left luggage facilities are available at Milan Central Station (Milano Centrale) on the Yellow and Green underground lines.

Contact us

If you feel that our services may be inaccessible to you, please contact our receptionists on +39 02 72 3001 who will try and find an alternative way of providing access for you.
